edu.stanford.math.plex4.io
Class MatlabWriter

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.math.plex4.io.MatlabWriter

public class MatlabWriter
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates writing to Matlab files. It contains functions for basic output (e.g. comments), as well as the output of numerous mathematical objects. Important Note: The user must call close in order to flush the output to the file.

Author:
Andrew Tausz

close

public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
This function flushes the output stream and closes it.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

turnOnCommentMode

public void turnOnCommentMode()
This function turns on the comment mode, meaning that any output will be written as a comment and not Matlab code.

turnOffCommentMode

public void turnOffCommentMode()
This function turns off the comment mode. Thus any output will be written as actual Matlab code.

write

public void write(java.lang.String string)
           throws java.io.IOException
